section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
KIDA was esbalished in Sept 2016. The strategic goal of KIDA is to grow the number of its members, which will result in better opportunities for the development of joint innovations, laboratories and research, and for the establishment of new types of collaboration between education, scientific and business organizations. 
Mission: To position Bulgaria as a top global destination for knowledge-intensive services. 
Vision: Increase the competitiveness of Bulgaria as a knowledge-intensive services development location. Improvement of the business conditions in the knowledge-intensive sector and the investment climate in Bulgaria.
relevant_communication: Presently, the association is performing a Cluster project funded by the EU via Operational program Innovations and Competitveness aiming at development of managerial and administrative capacity, development of cluster and mutual knowledge-intensive products and services, close cooperation with the higher education towards improvement of the educational programs and preparation of large pool of expert staff for the industry across Bulgaria.
